faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about company formation in Hong Kong

questions.question: How long does Hong Kong company incorporation take?
questions.answer: Typically 5 business days after document submission. No physical presence required.

questions.question: Do I need to travel to Hong Kong to register a company?
questions.answer: No, the entire process can be completed 100% online. All documents can be submitted digitally.

questions.question: What is the minimum capital requirement?
questions.answer: There is no minimum capital requirement for standard companies. You can start with any amount.

questions.question: Can foreigners own 100% of a Hong Kong company?
questions.answer: Yes, Hong Kong allows 100% foreign ownership. There are no nationality restrictions.

questions.question: What are the ongoing compliance requirements?
questions.answer: Annual renewal and tax filing are mandatory. Company records must be properly maintained.

questions.question: How much does incorporation cost?
questions.answer: Our all-inclusive package starts from ‚Ç¨4,600. This covers all government fees and services.

questions.question: Do I need a local office address?
questions.answer: Yes, a local address is required. We provide virtual office solutions in our package.

questions.question: Can I open a corporate bank account remotely?
questions.answer: Yes, remote account opening is possible. We partner with fintech banking solutions.

questions.question: What taxes will my company pay?
questions.answer: Only Hong Kong-sourced income is taxed. The profits tax rate is 16.5%.

questions.question: Is this service legal for non-residents?
questions.answer: Absolutely, it's 100% legal for non-residents. Hong Kong welcomes international business.
